attributes.action: Suspend motorway services parking charges for HGV drivers.
attributes.additional_details: Many transport companies ask their driver not to park in services because of the costs. Now is the time to give the drivers the security they need during this crisis.
attributes.background: Services are closed for food so can only be used as rest stops and to add fuel. These service areas charge up to £27 per night to park. Surely these charges should be suspended.
